text: This is a list of ships and classes of the Soviet Navy. == Corvettes == In the Soviet Navy were classed as small anti-submarine ships (MPK). * Grisha I class (project 1124.1), 37 ships built in 1966–1982 * Nanuchka I class * Nanuchka II class * Grisha II class (project 1124P, P stands for pogranichnyi – on the border), 20 ships built in 1972–1988 * Nanuchka III class * Nanuchka IV class *
